Posts.Content: Mar 4, 2015 10:58PM joanie848 wrote: Count me in too! The club nobody wants to join, but grateful not to be alone. I have been lurking...dx last march mets to lymph nodes and bone after believing i beat Stage 2 twice! Found lump in my armpit near radiation site and bone scan and biopsies revealed mets.Â  On Lupron, arimidex and zometa and trying to remain positive despite yukky side effects!
